0.3.name: wordpress/gestpay-gateway-for-wp-e-commerce
0.3.description: Adds the Gestpay payment option into WP e-commerce. "Gestpay" is the credit card payment system made by Banca Sella and widely used in Italian e-commerce websites. "WP e-commerce" is a Wordpress e-commerce plugin to add e-commerce functionalities to stardard Wordpress CMS.
